My Xuan B1 Conac Industrial Zone, My Xuan Town, Tan Thanh District, BR-VT Province, Vietnam

1. Sales Executive (S.E): MALE (Only)- Working at: HCM or BRVT - Market research: find out information of Aluminum market, competitors, suppliers, customers - Paper work: translate documents as requested, do weekly and monthly reports - Handling multi-tasks as per request from Manager and Supervisor - Research and directly contact with overseas customs department to find information of customs regulations - Handling shipment from Vietnam to other countries and vice versa - Find out foreign trade knowledge and forwarding business - Handling orders: negotiate sales contracts, payment terms, follow up the shipment schedule, delivery terms independently 2. Sales Support Admin (S.S.A): FEMALE (Only). Working at BRVT - Prepare shipment documents: Invoice, Packing List, Delivery Order, Letter of Credit, Certificate of Origin, Insurance... ( Require Experienced)

- New graduated students (Male for S.E and Female for S.S.A) - No limited quantity - University Graduation - Work at factory in My Xuan B1 Industrial Zones, My Xuan Town, BR-VT:prefer local people in Đồng Nai and BR-VT - Age from 1990 to 1992 - Willingness to travel and work overseas - Good at 04 skills (listening, speaking, reading and writing) both English and Vietnamese - Good communication and negotiation skills - Having team work spirit and working under high pressures - Aggressive, active, confident, independent - Willing to study and challenge from new things - Careful and honest - Salary: Negotiable - Probation: 02 months
